ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The mountains reduced to dust and blown away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the mountains are blown away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The mountains will be blown away as dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the mountains are made into dust and blown away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the mountains are blown away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the mountains are carried away as dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when the mountains shall be scattered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the mountains are blown away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when the mountains crumble into dust
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the mountains are carried away by wind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when the mountains are scattered [like dust]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the mountains are blown away;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the mountains are blown away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the mountains are blown away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:10] and when the mountains are blown away, crushed to pieces and blown in the air,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And when the mountains are blown away,
